title: Foundations of Data Structures: Mobile-Based Practical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary programming concepts and logical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centric learning environment, flexible scheduling, and asynchronous online interaction

learning_goals: Learners can explain four fundamental data structures: arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.
They can select appropriate data structures for real-world work scenarios and propose implementation strategies.
Learners can complete implementation projects for three or more data structures in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
